metadata.description: Custom utility skills collection including geolocation services, model comparison, and more

plugins.name: expert-skills
plugins.description: A collection of custom skills for various tasks including Amap geolocation services and model comparison capabilities

skills.name: amap
skills.description: 高德地图服务工具包，支持地址解析、逆地址解析、路径规划、POI搜索和IP定位

skills.name: model-comparison
skills.description: LLM模型对比工具，支持多维度比较不同模型的性能、能力和成本
